theme_strategy.rationale: Medical environments require high contrast for readability in low-light monitoring rooms. The 'dark mode' also aligns with the Web3/Blockchain aesthetic (opBNB) and reduces eye strain for long-duration monitoring.

visual_enhancers.description: Use 1px borders with low opacity to define areas. Avoid heavy card backgrounds. Create a 'technical' look.

layout_strategy.dashboard_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 p-4 md:p-6
rules: Density: Use col-span-2 or col-span-3 for main charts.
Stretch: Use h-full on all grid children to align bottoms.
Negative Space: Don't fill every pixel; leave some cells empty or use them for decorative data viz.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-6 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-6 py-2 rounded-md font-medium
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium
buttons.destructive: bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90 h-10 px-6 py-2 rounded-md font-medium

cards.base: rounded-xl border border-border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm

badges.default: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text on dark backgrounds uses text-white or text-gray-200. Avoid dark gray text on dark backgrounds.
accessibility.aria_labels: All charts must have aria-label describing the data trend.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use grids and asymmetry.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays separate good from extraordinary.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
For charts, use Recharts with the customized color palette defined in 'functional' colors.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the frontend. Use the color palette and typography defined here. The theme is 'Medical Cyberpunk' - clean, dark, precise, with neon accents for data. Use the 'bento_grid' layout for the dashboard. Use 'grid_borders' surface strategy for containers. Implement the 'verified' badge style for all AI/Blockchain elements.
